catalog_info.title: Tutorial - Junior Year
catalog_info.notes:
Mariano Siskind and members of the Department Successful completion of one term of Latin American Studies 98 (or equivalent) is required of all thesis-track honors concentrators in Latin American Studies in their junior year.
This course is taught by members of the Department.
catalog_info.description: Weekly individual instruction for juniors pursuing a thesis honors track in Latin American Studies, culminating in the writing of a 20-25 page research paper in either Spanish or Portuguese.
